page.title: 20EDUCATION AND CREDITS
page.content:
A school was built in St.Breward in 1852, before that date the only school available to the children in the area was a Dame School at Keybridge. In 1930 it was moved to its present site. In 1985 it has 62 children aged 5 to 11 yrs. in 3 classes. This Domesday project was prepared and put together by 3rd and 4th yr. children of St. Breward C.P.School:
Neil Grigg Guy Old Steven Pethick Leah Metters Simon Hunt Helen Davey Philip Hoskin Alex Barnett Stuart Henderson Jennifer Carroll Ian Turner Emma Parker Jamie Cox Gabriella Waudby Matthew Teague Hamish Sturgeon Mark Prout Philip Hoskin Mandy Greenaway Mark Marshall
